product_description: A supple woven upper brings modern, dimensional texture to a slingback sandal lifted by a stacked block heel with a flexible, articulated sole.
product_details_and_care:
A supple woven upper brings modern, dimensional texture to a slingback sandal lifted by a stacked block heel with a flexible, articulated sole.

Adjustable slingback strap with buckle closure
